DiscussionGuideline.Title: Focus Group Discussions on Virginia Slims Lights

Sections.Title: Introduction and Ice-breaking session
Points: What Hankook Research and marketing research is
Introduction of the subject to be discussed
We want to learn about your actual and real behaviour and attitude, no sophisticated philosophy.
Please don't hesitate to express yourselves even though you don't agree with one another. No one is right or wrong here.
Now, please take turn and start to talk about yourself.

Sections.Title: Overall smoking habit
Instructions: Before entering this part, hand a piece of questionnaire to each participant for fill-up his overall smoking pattern including smoking period, average smoking volume a day, regular smoking brand, and occasional brands. After fill-up, get back and read.

ToEachParticipant: You wrote that your regular brand is ___. Can you tell us the reasons of smoking this brand? Please be more specific.
Your previous regular brand was ___. How come did you switch to ___?

ToThoseWithMultipleOccasionalBrands: Which brand among them is the most frequently smoking occasional brand?
Why do you smoke that brand more frequently?
How frequently do you smoke that brand nowadays?
Do you have any other brands which had been smoking regularly, but now don't smoke? If yes, which brand is it? How come did you quit that brand?

Questions.BroadQuestion: I know this is too broad a question, but please tell me why you smoke imported cigarettes instead of domestic cigarettes specifically.
ProbeFurther: Most of imported brands are more expensive, but you smoke it. Why? Price? Why?
Quality? How do you know it?
Taste? Which taste? Isn't there any domestic brands?
